title: Bradford Assay
author: Opentrons
description: Test six standards and four samples (all in duplicate) using the Bradford Reagent.
process:
Transfer 6 standards from tube rack to first two rows of plates (in duplicate).
Transfer 4 samples from tube to first two rows of plates (in duplicate).
Fill rows 4-11 with diluent.
Dilute samples down rows.
Add 200 uL Bradford Reagent to all rows.
preview: Test four samples against six known standards using the Pierce Coomassie Plus Bradford Assay Reagent

markdown.title: Bradford Assay
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: Test six standards and four samples (all in duplicate) using the Bradford Reagent.
markdown.reagents:
* Diluent
* [Pierce Coomassie Plus Assay Reagent](https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/23238)
* Albumin Standard Samples
* Protein samples
markdown.process:
1. Transfer 6 standards from tube rack to first two rows of plates (in duplicate).
2. Transfer 4 samples from tube to first two rows of plates (in duplicate).
3. Fill rows 4-11 with diluent.
4. Dilute samples down rows.
5. Add 200 uL Bradford Reagent to all rows.
markdown.preview: Test four samples against six known standards using the Pierce Coomassie Plus Bradford Assay Reagent
